product.title: Long Snuggly Pink Gray Cat Plushies
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Say HELLO to a lifetime filled with snuggles

    Get ready for a super cozy good night's sleep, with our long snuggly plushies featuring two adorable long cats. These are designed to wrap your entire body around and will be your new favorite snuggle buddy. Filled with 100% high-quality PP cotton and is irresistibly soft to the touch. Made with a zipper design so you can take the filling out and wash the outer material for a quicker drying process.

    Available in three different sizes and two colors. Choose the size and color you would like before adding it to your cart.

    It may get lonely from time to time but your problems will melt away with this plushie

    If you like your hugs long and snuggly, then you're going to love our plush cat. Hug them to sleep and squeeze them when you're feeling stressed or anxious.

    Cuddling a body pillow whilst you sleep have been proven to help you sleep better as it slowly relieves the pressure on your lower back, spine, and hips, especially for those who sleep on their sides. The soft and soothing texture helps create a calm and relaxing safe haven.


    The perfect gift for your loved ones!

    It’s time to express love for your family and friends by surprising them with our adorable plushies! Whether you want to make someone happy or impress your significant other on a special occasion, our plushie will surely make them smile. Leave an everlasting smile on your loved ones today.

    Features

    ✨ Filled with 100% premium PP cotton
    💖 Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    😊 Allergy-free and asthma friendly
    😎 Designed with a zipper


    Plushie sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-10cm depending on the animal you select as the tail, ears, and legs may vary in length. Carefully choose the size and variant you would like before purchasing our plushies. Note that the long snuggle buddies come in three different lengths. The size and filling will vary depending on the length you choose.

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the plushies filled with?     All our plushies are filled with High-Quality Premium PP Cotton with an outer layer so soft you won't want to stop hugging it.

    Does this help with anxiety and sleep?     Our plushies are crafted for maximum comfort, so you will find no trouble sleeping when cuddling our Kawaiies plushies. Just check out what our customers say about them below.

    Can I wash my plushie?     Yes, you can by following these 5 simple steps:

    Step 1:     Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plushie in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the plushie in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the plushie has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
